page.title: 11Recreation for Children.
page.content:
There is a large Playing Field adjacent to the school. Nearest the school there are two sets of two swings, one merry-go-round and a newly -erected 15 feet high "Geo-drome" climbing frame. These are very popular with all ages of children.
Further down the field there is a full size football pitch with permanent goal posts. There are two sets of smaller moveable goal posts too.
Along the west edge of the field runs a burn which offers an endless source of interest and recreation.
All children in the area spend most of their free time in the Playing Field, which is just as well as there is nowhere else to go.
